text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
In order to build Jordan's talents<n>even more, she and I are
taking part in<n>the summer training camp.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Raaah! All right, one more lap! Come<n>on, Trainer, let's go
extra hard today!<n>Uraugh!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Totally Tosen! I wanna go to the<n>festival tonight in a good
mood.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Whoa, didn't you hear? There's a<n>HUGE festival tonight at
a nearby<n>shrine!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: And I'm hella stoked for it. I'm100% going, so don't you DAREextend practice today. I'll make surewe finish everything on time.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Hey, wait a minute... If you didn't<n>know, that means you
weren't<n>planning on going to the festival,<n>right? Got
something else planned<n>then?
choice_data_list: No, I'll just be organizing my training notes.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Huh... You're one serious trainer, all<n>right. Well, whatever.
I'm gonna go<n>warm up for the next exercise.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After that, true to her word, Tosen<n>Jordan gives practice her
all. Once we<n>finish, she swiftly makes her way to<n>the
festival.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Or at least, I thought she would...

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Ah, there you are. Come on, we're<n>headed out.
choice_data_list: Huh? Weren't you going to the festival?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
I am, and you're coming with me.<n>Now let's hurry up and
go.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: You know, I'm pretty goated when itcomes to carnival games, butsomeone's gotta carry myprizes. Can't eat cotton candy with fullhands, now, can I?
choice_data_list: So you want me to do it?
So you want me to do it?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Sure do. And since I don't hear a<n>"no," I'm guessing you're
okay with<n>it? Good.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
With that, I find myself half-dragged<n>over to the summer
festival.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Oh. My. GOSH. What are youdoing here?! And wearing a yukatatoo! And—hold on, isn't that yourcrush?!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan's Friend
text_block_list.text:
Shhh! Don't be so loud! This is why I<n>didn't tell anyone I
was coming!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, right, I bet you wanted to show<n>off! Anyway, I better
get evidence for<n>later. Trainer, take a picture of us! Say<n>
cheeeese!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
You don't have anyone to take a<n>photo of you two together,
do you? I'll<n>take one. I'll even make it super cute<n>before I
send it to you. Make a peace<n>sign!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Whoa, what's with these chocolatebananas? They're practically glowsticks. I'm gonna go blind!

text_block_list.name: Game Operator
text_block_list.text:
Gimme a break, kid. I'm trying to<n>keep up with the times!
You<n>youngsters like taking pictures, right?<n>I thought these
would be good, but did<n>I go too far?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
No way! This is PEAK festival cuisine!<n>I 100% stan these
banans. I'll take<n>one. How about you, Trainer?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: What, you scared? This isliterally a banana glow-up. Get inhere and get your hands covered inneon chocolate!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Pfft, haha! You looked so serious<n>there! Well, glad you're
getting into<n>the vibes. Let's take a selfie with<n>these two
bananas.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
We continue to explore the festival,<n>and I'm surprised by
how much fun<n>we're having. We may not be close<n>
friends, but we seem to enjoy each<n>other's company.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Boom...

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Ah, yes! Fireworks! Now this isgiving festival.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
You do?! We finally found something<n>we have in common,
then! Huh, I had<n>no idea...

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Although, I guess there aren't manypeople who hate fireworks.Guess we're not really vibing afterall.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
I mean... We're so different, you<n>know? I was just thinking,
wouldn't it<n>be nice if we had, like, one thing in<n>common?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: That way, even if we are fromdifferent planets, we can at leastenjoy something together. GuessI've been kinda worried about it.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
So that's why she brought me to the<n>festival. She's been
trying to connect<n>with me, in her own way.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Fireworks aren't the best common<n>interest, huh... Yeah, no
good. Guess<n>we're gonna be stuck as complete<n>
strangers, huh?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: It is?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: While we may not understand eachother, we've both shown that wewant to. If Tosen Jordan hastaught me anything, it's that the desireto understand is what's mostimportant.
choice_data_list: Thanks for trying to understand me.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Um... Whatever. I still think it'd be<n>better if we vibed more.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Whether it'd be food, comedy,clothes, or just... vibes. It'd be somuch better and easier if wewere the same.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
I mean, it's annoying studying stuff<n>we don't understand,
right? Like,<n>watching UmaToks or comedy shows<n>you
don't find funny just feels so<n>cringe.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
But... If that's how it's gotta be, I<n>guess I'm okay with it. At
least we<n>agree that fireworks are pretty...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I can still feel some distance from<n>Tosen Jordan as she
mumbles away.<n>However, I know that the more we<n>talk,
the more that distance will close<n>itself.
